title: Mangadu Megalithic Site
description: An archaeological site with Iron Age funerary megaliths located in the vicinity of the modern Moonamkutty-Mangad Road in the northeastern portion of India's Kollam municipality. The site was damaged by cashewnut tree farming and is now not visible due to habitation on the site.

properties.description: Approximate imagery location based on Google Earth representing Mangadu after Satyamurthy 1992.
properties.title: Approximate imagery location of Mangadu
